metadata.name: Japanese flower cards cherry blossoms
metadata.description:
日本の伝統的なカードゲーム花札をモチーフにし、布地を染め上げて桜の花を制作しました。桜色に染まったあたたかな世界を描いています。

Using the traditional Japanese card game "Hanafuda" as a motif, I created cherry blossoms (桜 - Sakura) by dyeing fabric. It depicts a warm world dyed in the color of cherry blossoms.


About the Creator: 
niwa sachiko – an artist who creates paintings with fabrics.
Using cloth, thread, beads, dyes, and other materials as painting materials, as well as her own unique method, she produces semi-3-dimensional art to express a warm world that makes you feel like touching it.
She has worked on a wide range of projects including calendars, TV commercials, picture books and brochures for the World Design Exhibition, etc.

Awards:
Aichi Advertising Association - Newcomer Award USA.3D Illustration Award - Bronze Prize x 3 times Creator's Summer Festival - Excellence Award

https://www.instagram.com/niwa_sachiko/
